name: v3.0.6: QR code with quiet zone
body:
- Local country for address formatting is configurable
- New output size: QR code with quiet zone

name: v3.0.5: QR bill data with carriage return
body: - Support QR bill data using CR (in addition to NL and CR/NL)

name: v3.0.4: Country code
body: - Display country code for LI and for payers with foreign address

name: v3.0.3: Fix broken dependency
body: - Version of main dependencies (PDFbox and QR-code-generator) frozen to prevent future hiccups with non-backward compatible new versions

name: v3.0.2: Romansh language
body: - Added Romansh language

name: v3.0.0: Improved validation messages
body:
- Improved validation messages (breaking backward compatibility)
- Removed trailing NL in QR code text (better standard conformance)

name: v2.5.4: Minor improvements
body: - Limit dependency "PDFBox" to 2.* versions (did work for Gradle only)

name: v2.5.3: Minor Improvements
body: - Improved QR code display for SVGs on low resolution displays

name: v2.5.2: Minor Improvements
body: - Optionally increase left and right margin for better printer compatibility

name: v2.5.1: Minor Improvements
body: - Fix version range for dependency (upper limit, better stb compatibility?)

name: v2.5.0: Minor Improvements
body: - When parsing QR code text, only the major version is check and the minor version is ignored (according to SIX instructions)

name: v2.4.3: Minor improvements
body:
- More tolerant date handling for Swico bill information
- New method to create QR reference
- New constructor for PDFCanvas

name: v2.4.2: Minor improvements
body:
- Revert change regarding leading zeros in QR code text: amounts less than 1.00 are written with a leading zero, e.g. "0.50" (in violation of the specification but de-facto standard – thus better interoperability)
- Improved message for `QRBillValidationError` exception
- New static method `QRBill.getLibraryVersion()` to query the library version

name: v2.4.1: Minor improvements
body: - Leading zeros are removed from encoded QR code text

name: v2.3.3: Minor Improvements
body: - Changed payment part translations

name: v2.3.2: Minor Improvements
body:
- Added method to draw separator lines only
- Fixed bug when appending to existing PDF document

name: v2.3: Swico Structured Bill Information
body: - Adds encoding and extraction of Swico S1 structured bill information

name: v2.2.4: Minor improvements
body: - Added field for *reference type* (useful when parsing QR code text)

name: v2.2.3: Minor improvements
body: - Fix typo in "Informations supplémentaires"

name: v2.2.2: Minor improvements
body: - New output size for QR bills with a horizontal separator line

name: v2.2.1: Minor improvements
body: - Fixed vertical QR code position

name: Minor improvements
body:
- Dashed and dotted lines to separate bill and payment part (dashed line with scissors is now the default)
- Fixed Italian and French translation of "Zahlteil"

name: v2.1.1: Minor improvements
body: - Missing linefeed after "EPD" is silently ignored when decoding bill data in QR code

name: v2.1.0: Minor improvements
body:
- Amount 0 is now valid (require to generate an advice, not valid for payment)
- Trailing line feeds are silently ignored when decoding QR code text (unsurprisingly such QR bills exist in practice even though they violate the specification)
- Improved QR code generator sometimes generates more compact QR codes (resulting in bigger pixels)

name: v2.0.1: Production release for version 2 specification
body:
Production release fully implementing version 2 of the QR bill specification and the associated style guide. 

New feature:
* Add QR bill to existing PDF file
